definition: to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent

sentences.english: I afraid we have no vacant suite room, would you mind having a double room?
sentences.chinese: 我們恐怕沒有空餘的套間了，你介意改定雙人間嗎？

sentences.english: The bridal suite was prepared for the reception of the honeymooners.
sentences.chinese: 新婚套間已準備好以接待度蜜月的人。

sentences.english: I stayed in the largest of the 3 -suite with king bed.
sentences.chinese: 我入住的是其中最大的一個套間帶有特大號牀。

sentences.english: We live in a triplex house of a multilayer apartment.
sentences.chinese: 我們住在多層公寓大樓的一個三室套間裏。

sentences.english: Suits are decorated in such way that you’ll get the feeling you’re actually camping outside.
sentences.chinese: 套間的設計會讓你恍若真的在室外露營。

sentences.english: The apartment was centrally heated,and we had bottled gas to cook with.
sentences.chinese: 公寓套間集中供熱，我們有瓶裝煤氣做飯。

sentences.english: The apartment consisted of two small rooms and a parlor.
sentences.chinese: 他們的寓所包括兩個小房間和一個套間。

sentences.english: There are two dressing closest and a large ensuite bath.
sentences.chinese: 有兩個大型梳妝衣櫃和一個大浴室套間。

sentences.english: The cozy guest bedroom has an large ensuite bath with white Italian marble.
sentences.chinese: 舒適的客房有一個白色意大利大理石浴室的大型套間。

sentences.english: Please reserve me a suite of two rooms .
sentences.chinese: 請給我留一個兩間房的套間。

sentences.english: The second volume contains the master bedroom suite and a downstairs office.
sentences.chinese: 第二個體量包括主臥室臺套間和樓下的辦公區。

sentences.english: I'm afraid we haven't vacancy suits. Would you mind having a double room instead?
sentences.chinese: 我們恐怕沒有空餘的套間了，您介意改定雙人間嗎？

sentences.english: They live in a poky little flat.
sentences.chinese: 他們住在一個逼仄的小套間裏。

sentences.english: I'm sorry to tell you that we have no vacant suites, would you mind order a double room?
sentences.chinese: 我們恐怕沒有空餘的套間了，您介意改訂雙人間嗎？

sentences.english: I'm afraid we have no redundant suite, could you mind to book a double room?
sentences.chinese: 我們恐怕沒有多餘的套間了，您介意改定雙人間嗎？

sentences.english: I am sorry we do not have enough suite rooms , would mind having a double room instead?
sentences.chinese: 我們恐怕沒有空餘的套間了，你介意改訂雙人間嗎？

definition: standard (hotel) room/two-person room of standard size and amenities/abbr. to 标间
one bedroom and one living room
private room (in a restaurant, or for karaoke etc)/parlor/booth/compartment
